instructions:
Combine peanut butter, syrup, and cinnamon in small microwave-proof bowl. Microwave on HIGH (100% power) 10-15 seconds. Stir to combine.
Dip waffle sticks into syrup and coat with jimmies.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons JIF® Extra Crunchy Peanut Butter
2 tablespoons HUNGRY JACK® Microwave Ready Regular Syrup
6 frozen waffle sticks, prepared according to the package
title: Waffle Sticks with Peanut-Cinnamon Syrup
